price: (Анткени,) Менин коргоочум – Аллах! Ал (мага асмандан) Китепти түшүргөн. Ал салих адамдарга жардам берет.
arabic: إِنَّ وَلِـِّۧيَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي نَزَّلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَۖ وَهُوَ يَتَوَلَّى ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Kyrgyz translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Kyrgyz language, translated by Shams al-Din Hakimov Abd al-Khaleq, reviewed and developed under the supervision of the Rowad Translation Center.

meta.transliteration: inna waliyyiya al-lahu alladhī nazzala al-kitāba wahuwa yatawallā al-ṣāliḥīna
